# plugins.autoreload

```lua
local autoreload = require "plugins.autoreload"
```

## config.plugins.autoreload

Configuration options for `autoreload` plugin.

### always_show_nagview

```lua
(field) always_show_nagview: boolean
```

Always ask before auto-reloading a file that changed.
